info.title: All your taxes and tax compliance up to date!
info.description: We are a professional team dedicated to calculating taxes and tax compliance. Keep all of your taxes updated without worrying about any procedures, we will take care of it.

info.title: It's our desire to become your allies
info.description: Our aim is supporting you with everything related to taxes and accounting to the level of being considered as another department of your organization.
info.subtitle: Mainly, we want to highlight:

attributesList.label: Compromise
attributesList.desc: We're compromised with you and your tax and accounting procedures. Our goal is reducing charges and avoiding them completely.

attributesList.label: Trust
attributesList.desc: We want to transmit the tranquility that your taxes and accounting are in good hands.

attributesList.label: Quality
attributesList.desc: We comprehend the importance and sensibility of tax and accounting procedures.

attributesList.label: Responsibility
attributesList.desc: We work as fast as we can to comply with our agreements.

attributesList.label: Vocation of service
attributesList.desc: We like what we do. Good delivered service redounds in advantages for both of us.

info.title: Our Services
info.description: We're dedicated to accounting which includes taxes and payroll, and some other services related with human resources.

list.title: Monthly services
list.items:
- Sales Taxes & Liquor Taxes.
- Monthly Accounting.
- Payroll & Payroll Taxes.

list.title: Quarterly Services
list.items:
- Quarterly Tax Returns.
- Profit and Loss Reports.
- Estimated Taxes.

list.title: Annual Services
list.items:
- Payroll Year End Reports and compliance.
- W-2's for Employees.
- Financial Statements (P&L/Balance Sheet).
- Property Tax.
- Corporate License Renewal.
- Audits for Workers Compensation and General Liability.

list.title: Annual Services
list.items:
- Employee Manuals Review.
- Wage Compliance in Accordance with the Department of Labor.
- No Aggression Policy.

info.title: Invoiced Services
info.description: Besides the recurrent services we offer, we can help you with the following services:

list.name: Tax Resolutions
list.items:
- Corporate Tax Returns.
- Tax Resolutions.
- IRS or State Audits.

list.name: Compliance
list.items:
- Labor Department and EEOC.
- Meetings with Lawyers.
- Support with Investigations, Mediations and Dispute Audits.

list.name: Licensing
list.items:
- New License / Permit Applications / Renewals.
- Incorporations.
- Projections for Commercial Real Estate.
- Trademark.

info.title: Contact
info.description: You are one step ahead of forgetting about fines and sanctions. Send us a message and we will get in contact with you for more details.
